        public static void renderText(float x,
              float y,
              java.lang.String text,
              Color color,
              float scale,
              int beginIndex,
              int endIndex)
        Render text to the screen at the specified place with the specified Color.
        Parameters:
        x - The x position.
        y - The y position.
        text - The text to be rendered.
        color - The color to render the text in.
        size - The size of the text to be rendered.
        beginIndex - The index to start drawing the string at.
        endIndex - The index of the String to stop drawing it at.

      • renderText

        public static float[] renderText(float xo,
                 float yo,
                 java.lang.String text,
                 Color color,
                 float scale,
                 Frame.Alignment halign)
        Render text to the screen at the specified place with the specified Color.
        Parameters:
        xo - The x offset position.
        yo - The y offset position.
        text - The text to be rendered.
        color - The color to render the text in.
        size - The size of the text to be rendered.
        halign - The horizontal alignment of the text to be rendered in the Display.
